Мы в AdMe.ru ценим людей с хорошим чувством юмора и даже считаем, что более смелое общение и отказ от скрытых переживаний благотворно влияют не только на отношения, но и на наше здоровье. Так что у родителей из нашей подборки определенно есть чему поучиться. Хотя бы тому, как метко, колко и оригинально высказывать свои мысли.

17 SMS correspondence with parents who communicate only in the language of sarcasm
Raising children is a difficult test. But, as you know, all works sooner or later are rewarded. Therefore, as their children grow up, parents finally find an outlet in that they can talk with them on an equal footing, actively tease, and generally be more frank.
06 Nov 2019, 09:11 by Bright Side
119 12 95 19 221k
Raising children is a difficult test. But, as you know, all works sooner or later are rewarded. Therefore, as their children grow up, parents finally find an outlet in that they can talk with them on an equal footing, actively tease, and generally be more frank.
We at Bright Side appreciate people with a good sense of humor and even believe that bolder communication and rejection of hidden experiences have a beneficial effect not only on relationships, but also on our health. So there is definitely something to learn from the parents in our selection. At least to how accurately, sharply and originally express their thoughts.
